Header.title: Devboxx Software Development
Header.paragraph: We design, build, and scale modern software—web, mobile, and cloud. From MVPs to enterprise platforms, we ship secure, maintainable code with measurable impact.

About.paragraph: Devboxx is an Israel-based software studio helping startups and enterprises turn ideas into reliable, scalable products. Our senior engineers and product leads bring deep expertise across web, mobile, cloud, and DevOps—pairing clean architecture with a security-first mindset. We partner end-to-end: discovery, design, development, QA, deployment, and ongoing support.

Services.name: Custom Software Development
Services.text: Greenfield builds and system rewrites using modern stacks and clean architecture.

Services.name: Mobile App Development
Services.text: Native and cross-platform apps (iOS/Android) with offline-first and robust QA.

Services.name: Web & API Engineering
Services.text: High-performance SPAs, microservices, GraphQL/REST APIs, and real-time features.

Services.name: Cloud & DevOps
Services.text: AWS/GCP/Azure, Kubernetes, IaC (Terraform), CI/CD, cost & performance tuning.

Services.name: UI/UX Design
Services.text: Product discovery, wireframes, design systems, and accessible, responsive UI.

Services.name: QA & Security Engineering
Services.text: Automated testing, SAST/DAST, threat modeling, and secure SDLC practices.
